trustfund:
TF040467-MACEDONIA, FYR:  WATER SUPPLY,TF040466-FYR MACEDONIA:  WATER SUPPLY,TF04046-FYR MACEDONIA:  WATER SUPPLY,TF036886-MACEDONIA, FORMER YUGOSLAV
            REP.-WATER AND SEWERAGE PROJECT,TF029660-PHRD-WATER SUPPLY &
            SEWERAGE PROJ.

abstracts.cdata!:
The Water Utility Improvement Project
            will enhance the operational efficiency of the Skopje
            Vodovod - largest water, and wastewater utility in Macedonia
            - to provide quality service, at affordable prices, and,
            provide sound bases for the development of the solid waste
            sector in Skopje. The project components are: 1) water, and
            wastewater development, which includes five subcomponents:
            a) water supply rehabilitation, through the construction of
            an additional water supply feeder line, and sewerage
            rehabilitation; b) financing water network efficiency
            improvements, and sewerage rehabilitation by the Operating
            Fund - subject to disbursements conditionality, based on
            contracting effectiveness between the City of Skopje,
            Vodovod, and the operating company; c) Vodovod
            restructuring, through technical assistance (TA), and
            equipment supply; d) engineering, and construction
            supervision services; and, e) project management support; 2)
            development of a strategy, and action plan for the
            implementation of solid waste management in Skopje,
            including an assessment for private sector involvement. TA
            will be provided for the completion of this strategy, and,
            the expansion of services by the Komunalna Higiena operating
            company, will require investments in equipment, waste
            containers, and sanitary landfills, to enable services to
            underserved low-income groups; and, 3) project management,
            and operating costs, to cover audit, consulting, and
            incremental services.
